data.Name: ZelGen
data.Description: ZelGen and ZelRetrieve allows you to create offline wallets easily. Create your own unique transparent address that starts with your desired characters! Available for Windows and Linux.

data.Name: ZelRates
data.Description: ZelRates API offers Zelcash prices in almost every fiat currency and Bitcoin. Create your own rates server easily.

data.Name: ZelSeeder
data.Description: Zelcash Seeder is a crawler for the Zelcash network, which exposes a list of reliable nodes via a built-in DNS server.
